title: Constellations
itunes:title: Constellations
description:
In this episode, the team discusses constellations with Colombian astronomer and post-doctoral researcher at École normale supérieure, Jorge Villa-Vélez.

Follow Jorge on Twitter @JurgenVilla !

Our merch store is now live! Go to idontknowaboutthat.com for shirts, hoodies, mugs, and more!
